evidence.claim: Givefront leverages AWS for cloud infrastructure.
The platform is designed to be HIPAA compliant, ensuring secure health data handling.
Integration with EHR systems via FHIR is supported.
Use of PostgreSQL for database management.
Givefront has implemented API-based integration methods for third-party platforms.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of handling X12 transactions or healthcare clearinghouse functions found.
